trans-unit.source: Provides the base functionality for creating event providers that send e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 提供建立傳送電子郵件的事件提供者的基底的功能。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management>命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件類型。</xref:System.Web.Management>

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。

trans-unit.source: The MailWebEventProvider class is a base class for building providers that monitor Web events and send e-mail for selected events.
trans-unit.target: MailWebEventProvider 類別是建置監視 Web 事件及傳送電子郵件，針對選取的事件提供者的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: This class supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be inherited from or used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別支援.NET Framework 基礎結構和非預期要繼承自或直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `<healthMonitoring>` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`<healthMonitoring>`組態區段。

trans-unit.source: You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需建立自訂提供者的範例，請參閱[How to︰ 實作健全狀況監視自訂提供者範例](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the initial values for this object.
trans-unit.target: 設定此物件的起始值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to initialize the <xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider> with the configuration settings and name as specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法呼叫以初始化<xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider>的組態設定和組態檔中所指定的名稱。</xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.
trans-unit.target: 在組態檔中用來識別這個提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref>指定組態檔中此提供者所指派的屬性。

trans-unit.source: No recipients have been assigned in config.
trans-unit.target: 沒有收件者已在指派給 config 。

trans-unit.source: Processes the event passed to the provider.
trans-unit.target: 處理的事件傳遞給提供者。

trans-unit.source: This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event.
trans-unit.target: 這是 ASP.NET 健康監視呼叫來啟動處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent"></xref> object to process.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent"> </xref>至處理序的物件。

trans-unit.source: Removes all events from the provider's buffer.
trans-unit.target: 從提供者的緩衝區中移除所有事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the health-monitoring system when an event buffer flush is required.
trans-unit.target: 需要事件緩衝區排清時，健全狀況監視系統會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: When the event buffer is flushed, a notification occurs and the entire event buffer is sent to the recipients in as few messages as possible, regardless of the length of time elapsed since the last notification.
trans-unit.target: 當事件緩衝區排清，通知就會發生，且整個事件緩衝區越好，而不論長度為何傳送到最少的訊息的收件者已耗用時間的最後一個通知。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Management.WebEventBufferFlushInfo"></xref> that contains the count of events waiting to send their notification.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Management.WebEventBufferFlushInfo"> </xref> ，其中包含傳送其通知等待事件的計數。

trans-unit.source: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.
trans-unit.target: 執行與關閉提供者相關聯的工作。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls the <xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider.Shutdown%2A> method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 呼叫<xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider.Shutdown%2A>方法終止裝載 Web 應用程式的應用程式定義域時。</xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully.
trans-unit.target: 方法會呼叫以執行工作，可讓應用程式正常結束。
